attributes.action: Get HM & Revenue to sort their filed work out!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HMRevenue & Customs have been around for many years but they still cause problems for us like loosing our data which we think is protected...

Why don't they do there work?
Why don't they send us letters which are revelent to our income/tax/credits/awards.

And why should they take our money away when they overpay us!

I think its time to look into the HMRevenue & Customs department. If they can't do the work then HM Revenue Customs will fall!

The petition is to get them to do their god dam work!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
